title: Hershey's Chocolate Cake
directions: Mix the dry ingredients together (first 6) - sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda and salt
mix the wet ingredients together (next 4) - eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla
combine the wet and the dry ingredients. Mix for about 2 minutes.
slowly pour the boiling water into the mixture. the batter will be thin
bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean
wait 10 minutes before turning the cakes out of the pans
